name: Silhouette (itch) (MetricZero, Searanger, zoped, tfx)
description:
There was once a shadow boy named Adam. Adam was tired from pulling several all-nighters in a row and wanted some sleep. Unfortunately for him, someone left the light on in the house! Help Adam find the light switch by manipulating the light to create pathways made of shadows.

Controls:
WASD = Character Movement
Space = Character Jump
Left Mouse Button + Mouse Movement = Move Light

Entry Info:
This insane marvel of computer science, mathematics, and mind bending perspectives was created in 3 days for the DevAtlas Jam 2 with "One Light Source" as the theme.
